synopsis.text: Gall ant space warriors, the Solonoids, are locked in a fierce battle between their Eastern and Western factions. The intensity of their conflict is legendary, but amidst the chaos, the East Force intercepts an enigmatic message from an unknown planet. Intrigued, the Gall Force of the East abandons the battlefield, leaving the West Force in disbelief. Unwilling to let the Gall Force escape, Lufy, the West's top pilot, embarks on a relentless pursuit to the mysterious planet. As the two factions collide on this alien world, the stage is set for a final showdown that could change the fate of the Solonoids forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
